revised_title: Comparison of Notions on the Difference of Refrangibility of Light by M. de Courtivron and Mr. Melvil
tldr: Monsieur Clairaut compares the theories of M. de Courtivron and Mr. Melvil regarding the difference of refrangibility of light rays. Both authors propose that the difference in refrangibility can be explained by the difference in velocity of light rays. However, Clairaut argues that Mr. de Courtivron's calculations provide a more solid foundation for this hypothesis.
